message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but $9,000 is significantly below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. Can you consider that?
